```{r}
library(sqldf)
library(ggplot2)
library(Lahman)
```


#Extracting Data

```{r}
query<-"Select weight from Master"
result<-sqldf(query)
```


#Visualizing Data

```{r}
ggplot()+
  geom_histogram(data=result,aes(x=weight), color='white', fill='blue', bins=60)+
  ggtitle("Body Weight Distribution for Baseball players")
```
